content: जुष् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> (जुषते-जुष्ट) {@--1@} To be pleased or satisfied. {@--2@} To be favourable or propitious. {@--3@} To like, be found of, take pleasure or delight in, enjoy; सत्त्वं जुषाणस्य भवाय देहिनां <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--4@} To devote or attach oneself to, practise, undergo, suffer; पौलस्त्योऽजुषत शुचं विपन्नवंधुः <ls>Bk. 17. 112.</ls> {@--5@} To frequent, visit, inhabit; जुप्रंते पर्वतश्रेष्ठमृषयः पर्वसंधिषु <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--6@} To enter, seat oneself, resort to; रथं च जुजुषे शुभं <ls>Bk. 14. 95.</ls> {@--7@} To choose. {@--8@} To enjoy, possess, have; <ls>Māl. 5. 18.</ls> {@--9@} To happen to. {@--10@} To delight in granting or performing. {@--11@} To show oneself favourable towards. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To like, be fond of. {@--2@} To fondle, cherish. {@--3@} To delight in, approve of, rejoice at. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> ( जोषति, जोषयति-ते) {@--1@} To reason, think. {@--2@} To investigate, examine. {@--3@} To hurt. {@--4@} To be satisfied.

जुष् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Liking, enjoying, taking delight in; <ls>Bh. 3. 103.</ls> {@--2@} Visiting, approaching, going to, taking, amusing, resorting to &c.; परलोकजुषां <ls>R. 8. 85</ls>; रजोजुषे जन्मनि <ls>K. 1.</ls>
